attributes.action: Encourage publishers to make more titles available as talking books
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Improve the access to reading material to partially sighted and blind people by making it mandatory for publishers to make their new books available in talking book format, even if you have to give them tax breaks to do this.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Encourage publishers to make more titles available as talking books."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
